title: Looking to buy a laptop under $1000 in QLD for league!
body:
Hi!!
I am looking at getting a laptop for under $1000, but i want it to be good enough to run league of legends on at least medium specs. I will also be running Runescape in the background. I don't really understand laptops very well so any help would be great. 

Cheers

replies.body: I would say it would be better to get a $600 pc, and a $400 laptop for work. A $600 pc is just as good as a $2000 laptop.
I travel the country in a small car, so laptop it has to be...so please any suggestions would be good. I can spend up to $1500. Help me out ;)

yea bro don't go laptops waste of money build your own PC and it will be 100 times better than any laptop you can buy, it will be cheaper as well, I know you said you're not good with theses things so even if you buy the parts individually and take it to someone who can build it for you you will still be ahead.

Your gaming laptop wont last long, from what you are telling me so far; Basically turning it on alots and little down time. 

Laptop are much more delicated than a Tower, if the weather's hot and you dont have enough cooling, +high usage times = malfunction hardware very soon.
haha no, but I do afking like wc etc etc
running runescape in the background... are you botting in runescape??? lol
I have an MSI gaming laptop that was about $1000, runs League at 200+ FPS, unfortunately the model is no longer available but you can still check out some other ones here https://www.msi.com/Laptops
